meanings.sent1: The two boys got into a fisticuff after school.
meanings.sent2: The boxers engaged in a fisticuff in the ring.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the characters pretended to have a fisticuff.
meanings.sent4: Their argument escalated into a fisticuff of words.
meanings.sent5: The fisticuff left both fighters with bruised knuckles.

meanings.definition: To engage in a fight with the fists.
meanings.sent1: He decided to fisticuff with his opponent to settle the dispute.
meanings.sent2: The siblings often fisticuff over trivial matters.
meanings.sent3: The friends playfully fisticuff to release tension.
meanings.sent4: They had to fisticuff their way out of the tough situation.
meanings.sent5: The rivals fisticuff fiercely for the championship title.
